Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=こと}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|言|tr=koto||word}}. Possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|것}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: {{ja-uk}} {{lang|ja|事}} (''koto'') is used for abstract things, such as an action or concept. {{m|ja|物|tr=mono}} is used for more concrete things, such as physical objects.
